content: This will see you face off against Erlang, The Sacred Divinity, The Four Heavenly Kings, and Erlang Shen. After winning the battle against them, you'll need to return to fight the Stone Monkey and The Great Sage's Broken Shell.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Endings_Explained.md', within the main section titled 'Endings Explained', specifically from the subsection 'Ending 2 - The (True) Secret Ending'.
The content is as follows:
This will see you face off against Erlang, The Sacred Divinity, The Four Heavenly Kings, and Erlang Shen. After winning the battle against them, you'll need to return to fight the Stone Monkey and The Great Sage's Broken Shell.
